description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物、外交官，曾任中华人民共和国外交部副部长、最高人民检察院副检察长。
description.en: A politician and diplomat of the People's Republic of China, who served as Vice Minister of Foreign Affairs and Deputy Procurator-General of the Supreme People's Procuratorate.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国外交部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部
en: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国最高人民检察院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高人民检察院
en: Supreme People's Procuratorate of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国开国上将，张灿明的兄长。
description.en: A founding general of the People's Republic of China and the elder brother of Zhang Canming.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交官。
description.en: A diplomat of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交官。
description.en: A diplomat of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交官。
description.en: A diplomat of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交官。
description.en: A diplomat of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交官。
description.en: A diplomat of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交官。
description.en: A diplomat of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交官。
description.en: A diplomat of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 张灿明是张爱萍的弟弟。
description.en: Zhang Canming is the younger brother of Zhang Aiping.

description.zh-cn: 张灿明出生于四川达县。
description.en: Zhang Canming was born in Da County, Sichuan.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国外交部

description.zh-cn: 张灿明曾担任中华人民共和国外交部副部长。
description.en: Zhang Canming served as the Vice Minister of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国最高人民检察院

description.zh-cn: 张灿明曾担任中华人民共和国最高人民检察院副检察长。
description.en: Zhang Canming served as the Deputy Procurator-General of the Supreme People's Procuratorate of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 张灿明于1957年6月至1962年8月担任首任中华人民共和国驻锡兰大使。
description.en: Zhang Canming served as the first Ambassador of the People's Republic of China to Ceylon from June 1957 to August 1962.

description.zh-cn: 1962年，张灿明的中华人民共和国驻锡兰大使职务由谢克西接任。
description.en: In 1962, Zhang Canming's position as Ambassador of the People's Republic of China to Ceylon was succeeded by Xie Kexi.

description.zh-cn: 张灿明于1963年9月至1967年1月担任中华人民共和国驻蒙古大使。
description.en: Zhang Canming served as the Ambassador of the People's Republic of China to Mongolia from September 1963 to January 1967.

description.zh-cn: 1963年，张灿明接替谢甫生担任中华人民共和国驻蒙古大使。
description.en: In 1963, Zhang Canming succeeded Xie Fusheng as the Ambassador of the People's Republic of China to Mongolia.

description.zh-cn: 张灿明的中华人民共和国驻蒙古大使职务由许文益接任。
description.en: Zhang Canming's position as Ambassador of the People's Republic of China to Mongolia was succeeded by Xu Wenyi.

description.zh-cn: 张灿明于1975年9月至1978年11月担任中华人民共和国驻芬兰大使。
description.en: Zhang Canming served as the Ambassador of the People's Republic of China to Finland from September 1975 to November 1978.

description.zh-cn: 张灿明接替史梓铭担任中华人民共和国驻芬兰大使。
description.en: Zhang Canming succeeded Shi Ziming as the Ambassador of the People's Republic of China to Finland.

description.zh-cn: 张灿明的中华人民共和国驻芬兰大使职务由谢邦治接任。
description.en: Zhang Canming's position as Ambassador of the People's Republic of China to Finland was succeeded by Xie Bangzhi.

position.en: Ambassador to the Arab Republic of Yemen

description.zh-cn: 张灿明于1973年3月至1975年7月担任中华人民共和国驻阿拉伯也门大使。
description.en: Zhang Canming served as the Ambassador of the People's Republic of China to the Arab Republic of Yemen from March 1973 to July 1975.

description.zh-cn: 张灿明接替王若杰担任中华人民共和国驻阿拉伯也门大使。
description.en: Zhang Canming succeeded Wang Ruojie as the Ambassador of the People's Republic of China to the Arab Republic of Yemen.

description.zh-cn: 张灿明的中华人民共和国驻阿拉伯也门大使职务由赵禁接任。
description.en: Zhang Canming's position as Ambassador of the People's Republic of China to the Arab Republic of Yemen was succeeded by Zhao Jin.
